Message:
She found me...a human infant,
with the ears and tail of a wolf...
inside an abandoned house...

Mother brought me home with her,
but the leader of her pack
didn’t accept me.

He said the weak are culled.
That is the law of nature,
and is not to be disobeyed.

Mother wouldn’t hear of it,
and left to form a new pack.
Just her and I.

Until we were welcomed in
by a human settlement,
Mother never gave in to
the hardships she was faced with.
She continued to protect and
raise me through it all.

My wish is to be like Mother...
No... I must be strong!

I am not weak.
I will become living proof that
Mother made the right choice.

My strength will serve as
my repayment, and atonement,
to her...

I will protect the human pack
that took me and my mother in.
Then, lead them as the unmoving
light of Heaven guides us
from the night sky...

I must become a strong,
noble wolf...!
